channel.title: Content on Duda Makes Things!
channel.description: Recent content in Content on Duda Makes Things!

item.title: Yogini Duda
item.description: This is my project for my Yogini Path and a healthy life I really like yoga, my first contact was with the postures(asanas) that I started in 2018 at a free class in the university that I used to do. It was really nice and I really loved the experience. Next, I used sometimes YouTube videos from Pri Leite and Yoga Mudra, two Brazilian channels but never did so often. I started to read more about yoga.

item.title: Electric Sheep Crafts
item.description: Electric Sheep Crafts is a brand created in February 2023 for showing to the world my work and selling it, but it represents more than just money for me. Sadly since I made it 1 year ago it is still an empty page. Basically is a Instagram page, click here to see it and a logo that I created and execute myself. The name was inspired in the book of Philip K.

item.title: [BO#1] Poor things
item.description: My opinion about the book Poor Things by Alasdair Gray

item.title: Test
item.description: First post to test how it will look like I am trying to set my theme in Hugo. And I am trying to learn better how to you Markdown language to write it.

item.title: About Duda Makes Things and Who Writes
item.description: Hello and Welcome! My name is Eduarda but you can call me Duda. I’m a Brazilian woman in the 30’s living in the Netherlands. I love to do handmade things, like crochet and knitting. In this space, I’m planning to post some projects, write about my opinion about books, and movies and write about my learning experiences. Why Duda Makes Things? Well, because I have a lot of hobbies and I love to learn, so, I have done and I do so many different things.
